crew_members.name: Silas Quickfingers
crew_members.description: A nimble thief known for slipping past guards and vanishing into shadows.

crew_members.name: Lyra Emberveil
crew_members.description: An arcanist with a knack for disabling magical wards and weaving illusions.

crew_members.name: Dorian Gearwright
crew_members.description: A tinkerer armed with gadgets, smoke bombs, and a questionable moral compass.

crew_members.name: Cassian Vey
crew_members.description: A charming risk-taker whose wagers can double the crew’s gains or leave them penniless. Once per heist, reroll a failed check (success doubles reward, failure increases notoriety).

crew_members.name: Seraphine Morrow
crew_members.description: A potion-brewer who concocts elixirs that shield allies from failure or amplify strengths. Once per heist, grant +1 to all crew checks in the next event.

crew_members.name: Finn Ashwhistle
crew_members.description: A sharp-eyed lookout, skilled at spotting patrols and warning of dangers ahead. Once per heist, reveal the next random event before it triggers.

tools.name: Aether-Charged Explosives
tools.effect: Breaks through vaults (lockpicking bypass) but increases notoriety by +2

tools.name: Disguise Kit
tools.effect: Lowers difficulty of guard-related events by 2

tools.name: Alchemy Kit
tools.effect: Allows crafting potions that temporarily boost any stat by +2 for one event

events.description: A guard patrol crosses your path.
events.failure: The alarm is raised! Notoriety increases.

events.description: A magical ward shimmers at the vault door.
events.failure: The ward flares and burns the intruder. Crew member injured.

events.description: A pressure plate triggers poison darts.
events.success: The trap is avoided just in time.
events.failure: A crew member is poisoned and weakened.

events.description: Rival thieves attempt to steal your prize.
events.success: The rivals retreat, leaving you the spoils.
events.failure: The rivals snatch some loot before fleeing.

events.success: The guards are defeated in a fierce clash.
events.failure: The crew is wounded and forced to retreat.

events.description: An aether conduit ruptures, flooding the vault with searing energy.
events.success: The mage channels the surge safely.
events.failure: The flood scorches valuables and harms the crew.

events.description: A lingering curse seeps from the relics.
events.success: The curse is contained with alchemy.
events.failure: The curse afflicts the crew, lowering morale.
A member falls and is injured.

random_events.description: Unexpected guard patrol disrupts the plan.
A collapsing floor threatens to drop the crew into the depths.
A rival crew shadows your movements, waiting to strike.
An environmental hazard—fire from ruptured aether pipes—blocks the path.
